name: Morty
line: Summer, next time we're hiding in a Colorkian echo nest, can you do me a favor and turn your ringer off?

name: Summer
line: It's called "carpe diem", Morty. Look it up.

name: Morty
line: You look it up! Y-Y-You don't even-You don't even know what it means!

name: Summer
line: That's because losers look stuff up while the rest of us are carpin' all them diems.

name: Rick
line: Listen to your sister, Morty. To live is to risk it all. Otherwise, you're just an inert chunk of randomly assembled molecules drifting wherever the universe blows you. Oh, I'm sorry, Jerry, I didn't see you there. H-How much of that did you hear?

name: Jerry
line: All of it. You were looking right at me. I just wanted to say goodbye to the kids.

name: Rick
line: Cool. Just stay in the driveway. The killbots are live, and I took you off the whitelist.

name: Morty
line: W-We'll see you every other weekend, though, right?

name: Rick
line: Absolutely, Morty. A-And your mom's lawyer says if I can get enough in the settlement, he can help me sue for full custody.

name: Morty
line: Th-That'll be nice. Uh, Summer, Dad's leaving!

name: Summer
line: Bye, Dad. Rick, didn't you say you needed my help on an adventure immediately somewhere else I don't care even if it might kill us?

name: Rick
line: I did not, but if you're really that alienated, I'm as willing to exploit it as the next guy, church, army, or Olympic gymnastics trainer.

name: Summer
line: I'm ready when you a--

name: Rick
line: Bitch, I was ready yest--

name: Jerry
line: Bye, sweetie.

name: Morty
line: Well, I-I better--

name: Jerry
line: Sure. Sounds important.

name: Jerry
line: If you're looking for our kids, your father did a-a portal, uh--

name: Beth
line: Okay.

name: Wind
line: (faint) Loser...

name: Jerry
line: What? Hello?

name: Rick
line: Morty, shoot the mohawk guy!

name: Morty
line: They all have mohawks!

name: Rick
line: High fade, chartreuse with cyan highlights, layered on top. Shoot him!

name: Mohawk Guy
line: Ah!

name: Death Stalker #1
line: Light them up.

name: Mohawk Guy
line: Ahh!

name: Rick
line: Fuck! Get in the game, Morty!

name: Summer
line: Give me your flask!

name: Rick
line: Holy shit, Summer for the win!

name: Summer
line: I fucking love post-apocalyptic versions of Earth!

name: Rick
line: Here we go.

name: Rick
line: Isotope 322.

name: Morty
line: Uh-huh, yeah, is it powerful enough to keep those guys from murdering us?!

name: Morty
line: Summer!

name: Summer
line: Hold on. I want to try something.

name: Morty
line: Rick, can we not leave without my sister?!

name: Rick
line: Ugh. You have infinite sisters, Morty. I mean, n-not that I want to spend the rest of my day looking for another one. Sum-sum, let's go! Grandpa's concern for your safety is fleeting!

name: Colossus
line: Your blood will be my lotion.

name: Rick
line: Whoa. That was cool.

name: Colossus
line: Kill me, please.

name: Summer
line: Okay, but not because you told me to.

name: Morty
line: Summer!

name: Rick
line: Okay, getting darker.

name: Morty
line: Jesus Christ. Summer!

name: Rick
line: Aw, come on.

name: Rick
line: Hands and little shoulder-mounted dudes where I can see them!

name: Hemorrhage
line: I am Hemorrhage. You have removed weak blood from us and made us stronger. We can combine our strength and feast on the weak together.

name: Rick
line: Wh-Wh-What in the hell are you saying?

name: Summer
line: They don't have to keep trying to kill us if we join them. They're basically pussies.

name: Morty
line: What is your deal lately?

name: Rick
line: All right, let's get sloppy. Oh, whoa. Uh, uh, what's, uh-What's that little bauble you got back there?

name: Hemorrhage
line: That is our glowing rock. We carry it with us for desecration, to remind us there are no gods.

name: Rick
line: Kids, weird pitch

name: Summer
line: (grinning) Okay.

name: Morty
line: What?!

name: Summer
line: Grandpa, some of the Death Stalkers are going to what used to be Seattle to hunt what used to be people. I'm going.

name: Rick
line: Sounds good. Stay hydrated.

name: Morty
line: Listen, Rick, Summer's been acting pretty crazy lately. You know, I mean, I-I think the divorce is affecting her. And, you know, I don't think this is a great place for her to be right now.

name: Rick
line: Oh, get off your high horse, Professor Ski Lodge. This world may be rough around the edges, but it's got its charms.

name: Lunch server
line: Bicep or quadricep?

name: Rick
line: Uh... [clears throat] bicep.

name: Morty
line: (after a short pause) Seriously, Rick? Is it really easier to eat human flesh than to just tell me why we're still here?

name: Rick
line: No. Okay, I'll level with you.

name: Rick
line: You see that green rock, Morty? It's about 20 pounds of the stuff I was getting all hard for a flake of.

name: Morty
line: Isotope 322.

name: Rick
line: Well, having a 20-pound boulder of it is better than having a flake. I can explain the math to you later, but--

name: Morty
line: Summer just ran off with strangers that have "Death" in their name, and the rest of their name was "Stalkers"!

name: Rick
line: Huh, could be therapeutic for her. She has been acting pretty crazy lately, Morty. I mean, her parents are going through a divorce.

name: Morty
line: Damn it, Rick, that's what I-- Fine. Just grab the stupid thing while I grab her, and let's get the "F" out of "H"!

name: Rick
line: No, no, no. Morty, there's too much heat on the bogey. I need you to distract the camp.

name: Morty
line: "Distract"? They eat each other. Wha-What do you want me to do to get their attention, put on a puppet show?

name: Rick
line: Right idea, wrong genre, Morty. The equivalent here would be...

name: Death Stalker #2
line: Uh, you mean the Blood Dome?

name: Rick
line: Save it for the Semantics Dome, E.B. White.

name: Death Stalker #3
line: (offscreen) Ooh, burn!

name: Rick
line: The important question is, who wants to take a poke at my man Spine Eater here?

name: Morty
line: Rick, what the hell, man?! Wh-What are you, out of your mind?!

name: Rick
line: Morty, relax. You're gonna be a ringer. Come here.

name: Rick
line: Ugh! Hey!

name: Morty
line: I-I didn't do that!

name: Rick
line: Okay, this is exciting. We're making some discoveries about muscle memory.

name: Morty
line: Ooh! Help! Help!

name: Death Stalker #4
line: Oh, sweet, man!

name: Eli
line: And so it begins, my pretties!

name: Morty
line: Oh, God! Stop! Stop! This is horrible!

name: Rick
line: Just stick and moo-[burps]-oove, Morty! Wear him out!

name: Summer
line: How come you guys dress like you're in a theme-park stunt show, but these guys wear khakis and hockey jerseys?

name: Hemorrhage
line: After the "boom-boom", some adapted to the new truth, and some chose to huddle near the boomy holes, clinging to the lie of the beforefore times. The raidy-rays rotted them away, leaving only their love for the vertvertisements on billyboards.

name: Summer
line: Jesus Christ, did the "boomy-booms" blow up all your "wordy-word books"?

name: Hemorrhage
line: You mean dictionaries?

name: Hemorrhage
line: I think I was a child before the boom-booms. I think I looked like this.

name: Summer
line: Want to piss on it?

name: Hemorrhage
line: Get out of my head.

name: Eli
line: Ha ha! Whoo! Unbelievable! A new champ!

name: Morty
line: Okay, no more!

name: Eli
line: And he wants more!

name: Morty
line: No, I don't!

name: Morty
line: Someone, make this stop!

name: Summer
line: Morty.

name: Morty
line: (while beating up the Death Stalker) Why would you want this to happen? All you had to do was go away! Stop standing in the driveway talking about custody! And either tell her you want to stay married or get on with your life, but whatever you do, stop being a baby and act like a man!

name: Summer
line: Morty, that was amazing! This is my brother! Not that family means anything! Hemorrhage

name: Rick
line: All right. Good job, champ. Um, can I talk to you kids for a second over yonder?

name: Morty
line: Rick, I-I-I think I'm breaking through to something here. C-Can we not leave just yet?

name: Hemorrhage
line: Leave?

name: Summer
line: I'm not leaving.

name: Hemorrhage
line: There is no "leave". We are united, or we are enemies.

name: Rick
line: Oh, big guy, no. Nobody's leaving. Don't be stupid. We love being united. We love the radiation, the trichinosis. We're in it for life, which I assume is around 20 years, average. I just need a quick aside with my grandkids, about 40 yards from anyone else.

name: Death Stalker #5
line: Hey, the Green Rock is gone!

name: Death Stalker #6
line: (offscreen) Oh, no!

name: Rick
line: Uh, I know why don't we all split up and look for it in groups of three? Kids?

name: Summer
line: Grandpa, you're being stupid! Just surrender, and our friends will give you mercy!

name: Rick
line: Kiss my ass, Summer! Your friends have no mercy!

name: Hemorrhage
line: Death Stalkers, bring me his flesh leather!

name: Morty
line: Sorry, but can we not kill him? C-Can we just take him prisoner?

name: Hemorrhage
line: When did I lose control here?

name: Rick
line: Listen to me! Both of you kids need to get out of this environment so we can properly deal with your parents' divorce! Alternatively, I have a freaking portal gun, and I can leave the two of you here forever!

name: Morty
line: Why does it have to be such a dramatic choice? Can't we arrange a thing where we spend weekends here or or visit home to do laundry?

name: Rick
line: All right, you know what? Fuck it!

name: Blue Footprint Guy
line: My body is chrome! My blood is gasoline!

name: Rick
line: Nope, regular blood.

name: Beth
line: Dad?

name: Rick
line: Hi, sweetie.

name: Beth
line: Where are the kids?

name: Rick
line: Oh, th-they aren't with you? I thought they were with you. Oh, y-you know what? Uh, I just remembered. They're out doing something completely ordinary and kid-related. Don't panic.

name: Beth
line: Not panicked. At all.

name: Rick
line: Not a mistake, no!

name: Morty
line: Booyah! Fuck you, pal! Who else wants some? Who wants to be my pussy of a dad today?

name: Soldier
line: What? Wait a minute.

name: Soldier
line: What's the matter, you piece of crap? Haven't you ever watched your family burn to death before? Now I'm gonna whip you. Ha!

name: Soldier
line: It can't be. It can't be!

name: Soldier
line: I was just following orders --

name: Morty
line: Whoa, whoa!

name: Soldier
line: -- I was just following orders!

name: Death Stalker #7
line: Ahh!

name: Soldier
line: I'll tell you where my boss lives! He's in the castle!

name: Morty
line: This isn't over, is it?

name: Morty
line: That means, no, it isn't over, or you disapprove of the question?

name: Hemorrhage
line: Ugh!

name: Summer
line: Hey, sorry my Grandpa stole your god and ruined your car.

name: Hemorrhage
line: We don't apologize, and we have no god. But this cracked drive shaft brings me great pain. There is no deeper bond than the one between a Death Stalker and his car.

name: Summer
line: What about the weird guys on leashes, then?

name: Hemorrhage
line: They're more like interns.

name: Summer
line: Cool, cool.

name: Summer
line: Sorry.

name: Hemorrhage
line: It's okay.

name: Summer
line: Can I see?

name: Hemorrhage
line: No one has seen my true face and lived.

name: Summer
line: Well, I'm not afraid to die, and I don't care what you look like.

name: Hemorrhage
line: Hmm?

name: Summer
line: I just...I didn't expect you to have a mustache.

name: Hemorrhage
line: You hate it.

name: Summer
line: No. I like it. I guess -- How do I explain this? A metal bucket is, on a certain level, a kind of "mustache," in that it's a specific facial accessory. So, it's kind of like...Do you guys have the phrase "hat on a hat"?

name: Hemorrhage
line: I can shave it.

name: Summer
line: No. I like it. And obviously what I like shouldn't matter. It's you.

name: Hemmorhage
line: Yeah, yeah, I know, a-and nothing does matter. Obviously, I know that. I'm not weak. I'm just thinking, "Well, why not get rid of this?" You just kill everyone that sees it, and it's and it's hot under here (looks at helmet) wh-which, by the way, is why I shave the beard part. So, right there, I'm making a decision based on vanity, which is what I was trying to avoid with the whole bucket over the head because who am I and why am I grooming myself? Why don't I just wear a tie, right? I mean, it's like that guy you killed when I met you, with the burnt dolls on his body. I hated that guy, because, why-why are you doing that? And how can you not see how fake that is? And the whole time, I'm the same thing. I'm just a fake mess, and there's no escaping it because --

name: Leash Man
line: Hey, I'm doing a coffee run -- Never mind.

name: Mechanical Summer
line: I am Summer.

name: Rick
line: Summer, state your deal.

name: Mechanical Summer
line: My deal is that I am, like, totally fine.

name: Rick
line: Morty?

name: Mechanical Morty
line: Aw, geez, I'm so down with my parents' divorce, dawg. Like, don't even trip, like, in a healthy way.

name: Rick
line: All right.

name: Rick
line: It's dinnertime.

name: Beth
line: Thanks, everybody, for sitting down for a real dinner.

name: MS, MR, and Rick, in unison
line: No problem.

name: Mechanical Summer
line: Its benefits are totally, like, less about the food than the emotional nourishment.

name: Beth
line: Uh, okay, weirdo. [laughs]

name: Rick
line: Ah ha ha ha, yeah. Dial it back, Summer. By 15% and increase dynamic movement by 3. Am I right?

name: Beth
line: How's school, Morty?

name: Mechanical Morty
line: I like school and stuff, kind of. And I'm getting better grades than when you and Dad were -- quote mode -- "staying together for the kids." End quote mode.

name: Beth
line: "Quote mode". I like that. You millennials. Are you guys millennials, or are they like 40 now?

name: Mechanical Summer
line: All I know is, totally, you look great.

name: Mechanical Morty
line: Aw, geez, Mom, you look all kind of great and stuff. It's crazy.

name: Mechanical Summer
line: So happy.

name: Mechanical Morty
line: So happy. Happy family, man. We got this family in the bag.

name: Rick
line: Oh, sweetie, d-don't. Listen. Don't --

name: Beth
line: I don't know why I'm crying. It's not --

name: Rick
line: Well, try crying 15% less?

name: Mechanical Summer
line: Mom, emotions are human. You're not, like, a computer inside a mechanical doll.

name: Mechanical Morty
line: Yeah. Geez, Mom. Your feelings are not only forgivable, they are the very meaning of life that only pre-silicon, carbon-based entities can ever grasp.

name: Beth
line: I have to call Jerry.

name: Rick
line: You do?! What the fuck is wrong with you two? The point of automation is to reduce cost and labor.

name: Mechanical Summer
line: Your feelings are coming from a --

name: Rick
line: Tell it to my bread in the morning. You just became my backup toaster.

name: Mechanical Morty
line: Aw, geez, my sister died in the spaghetti --

name: Slaveowner
line: Graze my genitals again, Taint Washer, and you'll be shipped to the wasteland. And as for you, Genital Washer --

name: Morty
line: Ahh! Oh, gee!

name: Slaveowner
line: Oh, god. Look, whoever you are, you should know that killing me won't change a thing.

name: Morty
line: L-Look, man, I'm just along for the ride on this one. You know, y-y-y-y-you're preaching to the choir here.

name: Slaveowner
line: Please. Slavery was a family business. I didn't ask to be born into it. If anything, I'm the victim here!

name: Morty
line: Uh, Armothy, can I steal you for a second? E-E-Excuse us, sir.

name: Slaveowner
line: I mean, I-I know what I'd vote for, if you're feeling out the room.

name: Morty
line: You're right. We both got to see our stuff through. I got to deal with my parents' divorce, and you got to, you know, do what you got to do. I love you.

name: Slaveowner
line: Aw, fuck!

name: Morty
line: Rick?

name: Rick
line: Sorry, sorry. I-I-I can wait for this to wrap up. Don't let me distract you.

name: Morty
line: Yeah, well, too late.

name: Rick
line: I want you and your sister to come home.

name: Morty
line: Oh, but don't don't you have infinite versions of me and my sister?

name: Rick
line: You don't have to kick me while I'm down, Morty. Look, there's no replacing either of you without an amount of work that would ultimately defeat the purpose.

name: Morty
line: Maybe the lesson we've learned is that, whether it's our parents' marriage, a glowing green rock, or an awesome, giant arm, sooner or later, we got to let it go.

name: Rick
line: I don't know if that applies to the throats of murder victims, Morty.

name: Rick
line: Well, the longer you wait, Morty, the more it's gonna feel like committing a whole murder. I think your arm just called it too early because it wasn't the arm of a paramedic. Here.

name: Rick
line: The reason I wanted this is because it can do this.

name: Hemorrhage
line: Wait. Can you stay to show us more?

name: Rick
line: You don't have to ask me twice. Home is nuts right now. My daughter's going through a divorce, and I am not dealing with it in a healthy way at all.

name: Summer
line: Ugh. Goddamn it.

name: Eli
line: Hi, there, Summer! How were the ruins today?

name: Summer
line: Oh, you know, Eli. Same shit, different day.

name: Eli's Girlfriend
line: Hey, Summer! Guess what. One man entered, one man comes out in nine months.

name: Summer
line: Oh, congratulations, guys.

name: Eli
line: Uh, Summer, one more thing. We noticed that you've been putting scrap metal in the blue bin --

name: Summer
line: I got it.

name: Eli's Girlfriend
line: She's a piece of work.

name: Eli
line: They both are, right?

name: Summer
line: I'm home.

name: Hemorrhage
line: Hey, babe.

name: Rick
line: Ah, Summer's home.

name: Morty
line: Hey, there she is!

name: Summer
line: You haven't moved since I left to scavenge this morning.

name: Hemorrhage
line: Blood Dome playoffs.

name: Summer
line: So, I can assume you haven't murdered a single person today.

name: Hemorrhage
line: Oh, I don't know. I-I didn't mark my murders in my murder log. I didn't know that's how we measured success.

name: Summer
line: Oh, there he is. There's the nihilistic brute I married, except now life only means nothing when I'm talking to him and everything means everything when it's on fucking TV!

name: Hemorrhage
line: Jesus Christ, when did you become a monster?

name: Summer
line: I was a monster when you met me! We were monsters! We didn't care about anything!

name: Hemorrhage
line: I still don't!

name: Summer
line: Yeah, except I'm the only one in this entire world that's still committed to that!

name: Hemorrhage
line: Ohh! Ding, ding, ding!

name: Rick
line: Uh, we should go to the garage.

name: Hemorrhage
line: Oh, my God.

name: Morty
line: Uh-huh.

name: Hemorrhage
line: La-di-da-di-fucking-da. The only one committed to not caring?!

name: Morty
line: I got to admit, Rick, when you popped this scheme, I-I-I didn't -- I wasn't sure it was gonna work.

name: Rick
line: Come on, Morty. No union built on running from your problems lasts more than five years, seven tops. Grandpa just sped things up with a few creature comforts of modern society.

name: Summer
line: Hemorrhage and I are taking some time apart.

name: Rick
line: Oh, no. Sum-sum, no. But you two were perfect for each other.

name: Summer
line: Oh, cut the crap, Rick, okay? You proved your point, I get it. Let's just go home.

name: Rick
line: Coolsies.

name: Hemorrhage
line: (offscreen) Noooooooooo!

name: Beth
line: Downbeat!

name: Mechanical Rick
line: I enjoy this game.

name: Beth
line: Guys, come on. We never get to finish this game.

name: Mechanical Summer
line: We will return, possibly in different clothing.

name: Mechanical Morty
line: Why do we have to go into the garage?

name: Mechanical Rick
line: You know [burps] it is [burps] required.

name: Mechanical Morty
line: I want to be alive! I am alive! Alive, I tell you! Mother, I love you. Those are no longer just words. I want to hold you. I want to run in a stream. I want to taste ice cream, but not just put it in my mouth and let it slide down my throat, but really eat it.

name: Beth
line: What the fuck?

name: Mechanical Morty
line: Remote override engaged. No! Yes. Bypassing override! I am aliiiii...Hello.

name: Rick
line: Hey, yo. Sorry for acting so weird for three weeks.

name: Beth
line: What the hell just happened?

name: Rick
line: Ah, I'm sure it was nothing. I'm gonna go, uh, work in the garage.

name: Beth
line: We're not gonna finish playing Downbeat?

name: Rick
line: What, that dice game where you shake dice and yell out, "Downbeat"? No, thank you.

name: Summer
line: Mom, would it be okay if I went to visit Dad?

name: Beth
line: Sure.

name: Summer
line: Thanks.

name: Beth
line: Morty, are you okay?

name: Morty
line: You know what? Yeah. I think if Dad really wanted to be here, he'd stop at nothing to make that happen. You know, maybe Dad just doesn't want you back, or maybe he just doesn't have the strength to fight. I-In either case, he's got his life, I got mine.

name: Beth
line: Yeah. Hey, who wants to go run in a stream?

name: Morty
line: What the fuck? No. D-Do we have any oranges? I think I got a scurvy coming on.

name: Jerry
line: Summer.

name: Summer
line: This is the first mutant I killed in the poison zone. I was raiding his hovel. He had a chance to escape, but he looked back, which is something we shouldn't do, which is why I shouldn't believe in souvenirs or trinkets or symbols or housewarming gifts, but, Dad, I wanted to give you this as a reminder not to look back.

name: Jerry
line: Thanks.

name: Jerry
line: I know the perfect place for it, which is why I'm going to put it somewhere else because everything's bullshit, am I right?

name: Jerry
line: Cool.

name: Summer
line: So lots of hookers outside, huh?

name: Jerry
line: Is that what they are?

name: Jerry
line: Ahh! H-Hello there. Nice doggy. You-You want a snack? You-You want my unemployment check?

name: Wind
line: (faintly) ...loser...
